entity.name: The Hotel Inspector
entity.description: Turning high-end establishments into more profitable ventures is the task of award-winning hotelier Alex Polizzi. Her work is not easy, considering the impeccable decor with low bookings, fabulous functions but dwindling profits and hoteliers who want to launch their brand, but don't quite know what their brand is yet. With her no-nonsense suggestions and the challenges she gives to the establishment owners, Alex spurs the hoteliers and B&B owners into action to ensure the highest standard of guest experience is attained.

urls.title: 5 ways to avoid plastics when celebrating Eid - Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Coming together around the table and sharing food is a big part of celebrating Eid, so The Environment Agency have produced this poster sharing 5 easy ways to ditch avoidable plastics. From using loose leaf tea to avoid the tiny bits of plastic found in many teabags to doing away with single use plastic cutlery. This is the first in a series of three themed posters providing hints and tips on ways to reduce avoidable plastic waste, jointly created by the agency‚Äôs plastics and sustainability team, supported
